review: The fire tv works great for amazon content. I use it mainly for amazon video on demand, Netflix, pandora, and YouTube. Lately I've been having trouble with pandora and YouTube, the won't load, take a long time to load, or are just constantly buffering. I get that amazon want you to use there services, but I like to use other apps, besides I purchased there product so I expect it to work as advertised. I don't dislike the fire tv,it's fast and works well for there apps. I also enjoy playing some of the party game with friends. I have yet to find a streaming player the does everything I want flawlessly. I've had several Google tvs and am currently using a cromecast on another tv. If you want to use a lot of non amazon apps this isn't for you. If you like the amazon experience then this is a great device.
